description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. A mysterious stairway was discovered in the town of Desolation that leads down to a labyrinth filled with dangerous monsters and untold riches.  Do you have what it takes to explore the DUNGEONS of DESOLATION?
